AT.name: Mario Party™ Advance
AT.description: Mario und seine Freunde sorgen mit einer atemberaubenden Mischung aus Aktivitäten für Einzelspieler und ihre Freunde für Partystimmung auf dem Nintendo Game Boy™ Advance. Außerdem stellt Mario Party Advance Professor E. Gadds Gaddgets vor: verrückte Spielsachen und Tricks, die den Spaß über das Spiel hinaustragen. Bowser ist uneingeladen zur Party erschienen und hat alle Minispiele über Pilz-City verstreut. Finde sie alle, indem du die Einzelspieler-Spielbretter abschließt. Sobald sie freigeschaltet sind, kannst du die Minispiele so oft spielen, wie du magst. Verdiene Münzen, um Gaddgets wie den Kompatibilitätsmesser freizuschalten, mit dem du sehen kannst, wie stark eure Freundschaften wirklich sind!

AU.name: Mario Party™ Advance
AU.description: Mario and friends bring the party to Game Boy™ Advance with a dizzying range of activities for single players plus their pals. Mario Party Advance also introduces Professor E. Gadd's Gaddgets: wacky toys and tricks that bring the fun outside of the game. Bowser has crashed the party and scattered all the minigames around Shroom City. Collect them all by completing the single-player game boards. Once unlocked, minigames can be played as often as you like. Earn coins to unlock Gaddgets such as the Compatibility Meter which lets you see how strong your friendships really are!

BG.name: Mario Party™ Advance

Collect them all by completing the single-player game boards. Once unlocked, minigames can be played as often as you like. Earn coins to unlock Gaddgets such as the Compatibility Meter which lets you see how strong your friendships really are!

BE.name: Mario Party™ Advance
BE.description: Mario et ses amis font la fête sur Game Boy™ Advance avec plein d'activités à vous donner le vertige, à faire en solo et à plusieurs. Mario Party Advance vous présente également les Katatrucs, jouets farfelus et farces du Prof K. Tastroff qui rendent le jeu encore plus fun ! Bowser s'est invité à la fête et a dispersé les mini-jeux tout autour de Champiville. Débloquez-les tous en terminant les plateaux du mode 1 joueur. Une fois débloqués, vous pouvez rejouer aux mini-jeux autant de fois que vous le souhaitez. Gagnez des pièces pour débloquer des gadgets tels que la jauge de compatibilité qui vous fera découvrir si vos amitiés sont vraiment solides !

ES.name: Mario Party™ Advance
ES.description: Mario y sus amigos se llevan la fiesta a Game Boy™ Advance con un montón de divertidas actividades para un jugador y sus amigos. Además, en Mario Party Advance también podrás descubrir los alocados inventos y trucos del profesor Gadd que harán que la diversión salte de la pantalla. Bowser ha aparecido de improviso en la fiesta y ha esparcido los minijuegos por todo Urbiñón. Completa los tableros en el modo para un jugador para recuperarlos y, cuando los tengas, disfruta de ellos tantas veces como quieras. Acumula monedas para desbloquear inventos como el compatibilímetro, con el que podréis comprobar la fuerza de vuestra amistad.

IT.name: Mario Party™ Advance
IT.description: Mario e compagnia bella arrivano su Game Boy™ Advance per dare inizio al più strepitoso dei party virtuali! Preparati a una selezione di attività letteralmente fuori di testa per giocatore singolo o per divertirsi con gli amici. Fai la conoscenza del Professor Strambic e vedrai quanti strampalati congegni e folli gadget ha in serbo per te! Il solito Bowser si è imbucato alla festa e ha sparpagliato i minigiochi per tutta Fungolandia. Trovali tutti completando i tabelloni della modalità per giocatore singolo: una volta sbloccati, puoi giocarci ogni volta che vuoi! Guadagna un mucchio di monete per sbloccare le Stramberie... Ad esempio, con il misuratore di affinità puoi scoprire quanto tu e i tuoi amici siete compatibili!

NL.name: Mario Party™ Advance
NL.description: Mario en zijn makkers brengen de gezelligheid naar de Game Boy™ Advance met een duizelingwekkende hoeveelheid aan activiteiten voor één speler en zijn vrienden. Mario Party Advance introduceert zogeheten Professor E. Gadd's Gaddgets; malle speeltjes en trucjes die je buiten het spel kunt gebruiken. Bowser heeft het feest verknald en alle minigames verspreid over Shroom City. Verzamel ze allemaal door opdrachten voor één speler te voltooien. Eenmaal vrijgespeeld zijn ze zo vaak te spelen als je wilt. Verdien muntjes om Gaddgets vrij te spelen. Zo is er een Gaddget die laat zien hoe sterk je vriendschappen werkelijk zijn!

NZ.name: Mario Party™ Advance
NZ.description: Mario and friends bring the party to Game Boy™ Advance with a dizzying range of activities for single players plus their pals. Mario Party Advance also introduces Professor E. Gadd's Gaddgets: wacky toys and tricks that bring the fun outside of the game. Bowser has crashed the party and scattered all the minigames around Shroom City. Collect them all by completing the single-player game boards. Once unlocked, minigames can be played as often as you like. Earn coins to unlock Gaddgets such as the Compatibility Meter which lets you see how strong your friendships really are!

PL.name: Mario Party™ Advance
PL.description: Mario and friends bring the party to Game Boy™ Advance with a dizzying range of activities for single players plus their pals. Mario Party Advance also introduces Professor E. Gadd's Gaddgets: wacky toys and tricks that bring the fun outside of the game. Bowser has crashed the party and scattered all the minigames around Shroom City. Collect them all by completing the single-player game boards. Once unlocked, minigames can be played as often as you like. Earn coins to unlock Gaddgets such as the Compatibility Meter which lets you see how strong your friendships really are!

PT.name: Mario Party™ Advance
PT.description: Mario e os amigos trazem a festa para a Game Boy™ Advance com uma estonteante variedade de atividades para um jogador e os seus amigos. Em Mario Party Advance vais também conhecer as engenhocas do Professor E. Gadd: brinquedos marados e truques que tornam o jogo ainda mais divertido. Bowser apareceu na festa sem ser convidado e espalhou os minijogos por toda a Shroom City. Recolhe-os todos, completando os tabuleiros de jogo no modo de um jogador. Uma vez desbloqueados, podes jogar as vezes que quiseres. Acumula moedas para desbloquear engenhocas como o Compatibility Meter, que te permite medir a força das tuas amizades!

RU.name: Mario Party™ Advance
RU.description: Марио и компания затевают вечеринку на Game Boy™ Advance! Сыграйте вместе с ними в одиночные и коллективные игры и оцените Gaddgets профессора E. Gadd: сумасшедшие игрушки и фокусы, которые заразят любого своим весельем. Негодяй Боузер испортил вечеринку, разбросав мини-игры по всему городку Shroom City. Проходите игру в одиночном режиме, чтобы найти их. Найдя мини-игру, вы сможете в любой момент сыграть в нее. Собирайте монетки, чтобы разблокировать самые интересные Gaddgets, такие как Compatibility Meter — измеритель силы дружбы!
